key.name: use-default-font
key.description: Whether to use the system's default fixed width font for editing text instead of a font specific to bedit. If this option is turned off, then the font named in the "Editor Font" option will be used instead of the system font.

key.name: editor-font
key.description: A custom font that will be used for the editing area. This will only take effect if the "Use Default Font" option is turned off.

key.name: show-toolbar
key.description: Whether Bedit should display the toolbar (containing shortcut buttons) at the top of the screen.

key.name: show-menubar
key.description: Whether Bedit should display the menubar at the very top of the screen.

key.name: show-statusbar
key.description: Whether Bedit should display the statusbar at the bottom of the screen.

key.name: show-overview-map
key.description: Whether Bedit should display a mini map of the document at the side of the screen.

key.name: word-wrap
key.description: Whether Bedit should soft-wrap lines that go beyond the edge of the visible area.

key.name: highlight-selection
key.description: Whether Bedit should highlight areas that match the current selection.

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: Whether Bedit should highlight the whole of the line containing the cursor

key.name: highlight-syntax
key.description: Whether Bedit should apply syntax highlighting

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: Wheter Bedit should show line numbers at the side of the screen.

key.name: auto-check-spelling
key.description: Whether Bedit should check files for spelling errors in real time.

key.name: insert-spaces-instead-of-tabs
key.description: Whether Bedit should insert spaces instead of tabs when the tab key is pressed.

key.name: tab-width
key.description: The width of a tabulation in characters.

key.name: trim-trailing-whitespace
key.description: Strip tabs and spaces from the end of lines before saving.
